title: Zara Parent Elevates Founder’s Daughter to Chairwoman
sub_head: Move places 37-year-old atop one of the world’s biggest fashion chains
body:
Zara’s parent company said it had appointed the daughter of the retailer’s founder as its new chairwoman, placing a little-known 37-year-old atop one of the world’s largest fashion chains.
Inditex SA on Tuesday said Marta Ortega Pérez, the daughter of its billionaire founder and controlling shareholder Amancio Ortega, would start in her new role in April. She will replace succeed Chairman Pablo Isla, who had previously served as chief executive.
